This was so beautiful! I kinda wish this got more views but I guess it is what it is. I been thinking a lot about the connection between human consciousness and quantum physics(after watching some of your videos and other sciencey vids); something tells me that maybe we need to factor in our own existence into the models of our universe. Think about it, isn't it just much too fascinating to ignore the fact that we are made of just up/down quartz and electrons, and somehow these combine in a way to create our amazing "consciousness" that can SEE and even INVESTIGATE the very same universe that gave us our existence in the first place? And this is even more interesting if you were to model the human race as one united living body, wherein every person on earth could be represented by a single cell, and they communicate with each other via internet. So now you have one large living body made up of smaller individual living components, and the internet would be the equivalent of a "brain" for this, united living body. What do you think about this Veritasium? I am genuinely interested!
